# Ghost ARGhost AR

Augmented reality on the web.

[Live Website](https://ghost.snap.com/)![External resource](https://microfeller.com/_app/immutable/assets/arrow.DD1KI4aL.svg)![](https://microfeller.com/_app/immutable/assets/arrow.DD1KI4aL.svg)![Ghost AR](https://microfeller.com/_app/immutable/assets/icon.By0tom_j.svg)

![Ghost AR](https://microfeller.com/_app/immutable/assets/hero.CSHQnks6.avif)![](data: image/svg+xml; utf8, <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' height='2520' width='3732'><image width='100%' height='100%' href='data:avif;base64,' /></svg>)

[Live Website](https://ghost.snap.com/)![External resource](https://microfeller.com/_app/immutable/assets/arrow.DD1KI4aL.svg)![](https://microfeller.com/_app/immutable/assets/arrow.DD1KI4aL.svg)

Ghost is a studio that helps solve real-world problems using Snap’s AR platform.

Whether it’s a new or existing product, the most experienced AR team can assist developers and researchers in breaking new ground and making a real-world impact.

Funding. 2B

Trusted by. 12 VCs

Audience in the first five days. 2M

Annual growth. 18%

Microfeller was responsible for development and analytics side of this project. Credit for design work goes to Play.

## Launchpad for AR products

Whether it’s a well-established product launch, the prototyping of something unique, or a research process where ML and AR go hand in hand, Ghost can be an ideal partner at every step. The website provides thoughtful insights into what’s achievable with funding and support from the studio.

![](https://microfeller.com/_app/immutable/assets/outer-1.CV8YXbj_.avif)![](data: image/svg+xml; utf8, <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' height='2463' width='3735'><image width='100%' height='100%' href='data:avif;base64,' /></svg>)

![](https://microfeller.com/_app/immutable/assets/inner-1.BQk-cERA.avif)![](data: image/svg+xml; utf8, <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' height='3405' width='2793'><image width='100%' height='100%' href='data:avif;base64,' /></svg>)

## Showcasing projects the Ghost way

Ghost studio has successfully supported multiple projects, and our team decided to add some flair to their showcasing approach. We’ve animated page content on scroll to create a 3D spatial feeling and tried to keep a playful mood by using unique fonts for headings. All of these elements can be managed in the CMS.

![](https://microfeller.com/_app/immutable/assets/inner-2.DHPyIHQx.avif)![](data: image/svg+xml; utf8, <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' height='2775' width='2793'><image width='100%' height='100%' href='data:avif;base64,' /></svg>)

## User-Friendly Application Form

Forms can be annoying, but we’ve done our best to minimize the hassle. Candidates can provide detailed information about their company and project without having to complete everything in one go. Form data is securely stored, without being sent to third-party services.

![](https://microfeller.com/_app/immutable/assets/inner-3.DQqSyRub.avif)![](data: image/svg+xml; utf8, <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' height='2754' width='2793'><image width='100%' height='100%' href='data:avif;base64,' /></svg>)
